mnd14:7.10: tassa → idaṃ padaṃ bj, sya-all potthakesu

mnd14:45.4: attā → attaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), nirattā → nirattaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)

mnd14:74.8: mahiṃsā → mahisā (bj) | gomahisā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), ḍāho → ḍaho (bj, sya-all), lohitapittaṃ → lohitaṃ pittaṃ (sya-all, mr)
